attributes.action: Create a nationwide campaign to replace waste bins with partitioned recycling bins
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Pretty much all the waste we put in public bins ends up on the landfill, but this could so easily be recycled. The Eden Project has the right idea, and has bins for recycling that are easy to use, and are pretty fun!

With a little instruction bins in public areas can easily be replaced with recycling bins that the public self sort with compartments for different materials. If the UK wants to meet it's recycling and emmisions targets and save serious money on recycling old materials  instead of using new raw materials this should really be considered.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Create a nationwide campaign to replace waste bins with partitioned recycling bins."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
